Class JScienceTheme

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.apps.framework.JScienceTheme
public final class JScienceTheme extends Object
Shared color theme for JScience Killer Apps. Provides consistent colors across all applications.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
